Namaskaram Mr/Mrs/Ms {{recipientName}},

Date: {{date}}.
Phone: {{recipientPhone}}.

Payment Method: {{paymentMethod}}.

Service Name	Price
{{serviceName}}	${{price}}

With Murugar Blessings,
Sri Subramanya Swamy Cultural Center
Murugar Kovil, MI, USA
